data.text: ――Breaking away from the pack is an adventure.
data.processed: <story>――Breaking away from the pack is an adventure.

data.text:
Cutting through the air, not looking over your shoulder. 
Yet, you feel the immense pressure from behind radiate over you.
data.processed:
<story>Cutting through the air, not looking over your shoulder. 
<story>Yet, you feel the immense pressure from behind radiate over you.

data.text:
Relaxing is not an option, lest those behind will catch up. 
On the other hand, speeding up drains your stamina.
data.processed:
<story>Relaxing is not an option, lest those behind will catch up. 
<story>On the other hand, speeding up drains your stamina.

data.text:
With fear comes risk... A gamble where the odds 
are against you. The only option for success is 
going all in! Hang on, now...
data.processed:
<story>With fear comes risk... A gamble where the odds 
<story>are against you. The only option for success is 
<story>going all in! Hang on, now...

data.text:
Controlling the pace and the direction of the race. The ruler 
of the race. That's what it means to use the runner strategy.
data.processed:
<story>Controlling the pace and the direction of the race. The ruler 
<story>of the race. That's what it means to use the runner strategy.

data.text:
Hmm? So that's your training plan for leaders? Pretty 
detailed for a beginner. Even planning out the second leg.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? So that's your training plan for leaders? Pretty 
<story>detailed for a beginner. Even planning out the second leg.

data.text:
You even included some G1s, not bad! And you want to 
take a record during... An overseas expedition...?
data.name: Veteran Trainer B

choices.text: Yes, that's part of the plan!

data.processed:
<story>You even included some G1s, not bad! And you want to 
<story>take a record during... An overseas expedition...?

data.text:
Hah ha ha! You're full of surprises eh, newbie? Overcoming 
everything, as long as you have motivation? Come, now.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Hah ha ha! You're full of surprises eh, newbie? Overcoming 
<story>everything, as long as you have motivation? Come, now.

data.text:
I think you should get your head out of the clouds. 
You should act a bit more seriously. You're an adult. 
What you're going for is like a child's dream.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>I think you should get your head out of the clouds. 
<story>You should act a bit more seriously. You're an adult. 
<story>What you're going for is like a child's dream.

data.text:
After taking notes on what she told me, I headed outside. 
I came across some kids near the river. I guess school ended.
data.processed:
<story>After taking notes on what she told me, I headed outside. 
<story>I came across some kids near the river. I guess school ended.

data.text: I'm gonna be a pro baseballer!
data.name: Boy with a backpack
data.processed: <story>I'm gonna be a pro baseballer!

data.text:
Well, I'm gonna be a pop idol! 
I want to be sparkling just like them!
data.name: Girl with a backpack
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'm gonna be a pop idol! 
<story>I want to be sparkling just like them!

data.text: ――And I, I'm gonna build a castle!
data.name: Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>――And I, I'm gonna build a castle!

data.text: You think my childlike dream is to laugh at, too?
data.name: Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>You think my childlike dream is to laugh at, too?

data.text: Hahaha! A castle? That's impossible!
data.name: Boy with a backpack
data.processed: <story>Hahaha! A castle? That's impossible!

data.text: What? Look kid, nothing is impossible for me, the great adventure hunter: Tap Dance City!
data.name: Umamusume
data.processed: What? Look kid, nothing is impossible for me, the great adventure hunter: Tap Dance City!

data.text: You'd better believe I'm not building any old castle! It's gonna be gigantic! Big enough for me and my mates to dance from night till the sun comes up!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: You'd better believe I'm not building any old castle! It's gonna be gigantic! Big enough for me and my mates to dance from night till the sun comes up!

data.text:
Party all night, every night until we collapse! 
A place where you'll be greeted by sonorous singing!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Party all night, every night until we collapse! 
<story>A place where you'll be greeted by sonorous singing!

data.text:
Of course, I'll need money! I'll race and race and race 
my butt off and make enough to fulfil my dream!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Of course, I'll need money! I'll race and race and race 
<story>my butt off and make enough to fulfil my dream!

data.text: Aaand... next! It's your turn now! You there! What is your dream?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Aaand... next! It's your turn now! You there! What is your dream?

data.text: Huh? For laughing at those kids' dreams, I expected you to have one far greater than them.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Huh? For laughing at those kids' dreams, I expected you to have one far greater than them.

data.text:
Don't think I didn't catch you acting like those 
kids' dreams were like jokes to you.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Don't think I didn't catch you acting like those 
<story>kids' dreams were like jokes to you.

data.text:
――I froze up completely, with my notebook 
clenched to my chest.
data.processed:
<story>――I froze up completely, with my notebook 
<story>clenched to my chest.

data.text:
Given your lack of experience, let me tell you a bit about 
the world of horse racing. Reaching the Open class 
is a lot tougher than you might realize.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Given your lack of experience, let me tell you a bit about 
<story>the world of horse racing. Reaching the Open class 
<story>is a lot tougher than you might realize.

data.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
<story>Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
<story>and going overseas, too...?

data.text:
My seniors tell me my dreams are unrealistic. It's laughable 
for an adult like me to even say it out loud...
data.processed:
<story>My seniors tell me my dreams are unrealistic. It's laughable 
<story>for an adult like me to even say it out loud...

data.text:
... Tell me anyway! 
I really, really, really wanna know!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>... Tell me anyway! 
<story>I really, really, really wanna know!

data.text:
Don't be so shy! An epic tale is something 
to be shared, am I wrong?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Don't be so shy! An epic tale is something 
<story>to be shared, am I wrong?

data.text: You can't even tell me? ――Is it that pathetic?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: You can't even tell me? ――Is it that pathetic?

data.text:
My sudden outburst shocked even myself. Although... 
I'm starting to feel a wave of regret sweep over me.

choices.text: (Why didn't I say anything back then...)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Why didn't I say anything back then...)</size>

choices.text: (Why didn't I say anything back then...)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Why didn't I say anything back then...)</size>

data.processed:
<story>My sudden outburst shocked even myself. Although... 
<story>I'm starting to feel a wave of regret sweep over me.

data.text:
Reaching the Open class is a lot tougher 
than you might realize.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Reaching the Open class is a lot tougher 
<story>than you might realize.

data.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
data.name: Veteran Trainer A

choices.text: (Yes, but I still want to try!)

data.processed:
<story>Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
<story>Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
<story>and going overseas, too...?

data.text: The more I think back, the more pathetic and frustrated I feel... It's my dream, and yet... I couldn't say anything to her.
data.processed: The more I think back, the more pathetic and frustrated I feel... It's my dream, and yet... I couldn't say anything to her.

data.text: ...You treasure that dream of yours?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>...You treasure that dream of yours?

data.text:
...My frustration reached its breaking point. 
I close my eyes and take a deep breath.

choices.text: I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!
choices.processed: <size=36>I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!</size>

choices.text: I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!
choices.processed: <size=36>I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!</size>

data.processed:
<story>...My frustration reached its breaking point. 
<story>I close my eyes and take a deep breath.

data.text: ...Really?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>...Really?

data.text: Ha ha ha! Well...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Ha ha ha! Well...

data.text: It's wonderful!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>It's wonderful!

data.text:
Today is a "Selection Race." Trainers gather at the racecourse 
and look for a horsegirl to be scouted. And there...
data.processed:
<story>Today is a "Selection Race." Trainers gather at the racecourse 
<story>and look for a horsegirl to be scouted. And there...

data.text:
It's showtime! 
My selection race has finally arrived!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>It's showtime! 
<story>My selection race has finally arrived!

data.text:
...Are you sure about using up your energy before the race 
even begins? It's medium-length. You'll need the stamina.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Are you sure about using up your energy before the race 
<story>even begins? It's medium-length. You'll need the stamina.

data.text:
Shakur! Coolheaded and giving advice as always. 
You're a lovely classmate!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Shakur! Coolheaded and giving advice as always. 
<story>You're a lovely classmate!

data.text: ...Shaddup.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Shaddup.

data.text: Haha! How unfriendly! ...Hmm?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Haha! How unfriendly! ...Hmm?

data.text:
I remember you! 
You're that "world's greatest" guy!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>I remember you! 
<story>You're that "world's greatest" guy!

data.text: Naturally. I would never forget you! ...Ah! I see, you're here to watch me race with your own eyes!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Naturally. I would never forget you! ...Ah! I see, you're here to watch me race with your own eyes!

data.text:
You wanna see if I'm fit to be 
"the world's greatest horsegirl."
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You wanna see if I'm fit to be 
<story>"the world's greatest horsegirl."

data.text: ――And thus began Tap Dance City's selection race.
data.processed: <story>――And thus began Tap Dance City's selection race.
